Colophon

IndieWebCamp wiki:

A colophon … describes how the site is made, with what tools, supporting what technologies.

Local tools

  • Micro (on desktop) and Markor (Android) text editors
  • mdformat and Rewrap for formatting Markdown
  • VS Code or VSCodium for HTML/CSS maintenance

Fonts

  • IBM Plex family
  • Default KaTeX\KaTeXKATE​X font
  • I have a stylesheet demo post

Site build

  • Conda (Miniforge) for environment management (why)
  • Jekyll v4.4.1 to build the HTML
  • GitHub Actions (wrapping Bash scripts) for orchestration

Hosting

  • Web hosting: GitHub Pages free tier
  • Domain: Squarespace (automatically migrated from Google Domains)

AI

  • Nope
  • Does Hunspell count?
